original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽2.6–7. Oghayogagocchaka🔽2.6–7.1. Oghadukādi🔽Oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma  ogha yoga gocchaka  ogha duka ādi  ogham dhammam paṭicca oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: In conformity with the ideas, The Numerical Series of Terms Beginning with the Floods

original: Yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…. (Dvepi gocchakā āsavagocchakasadisā ninnānākaraṇā.)🔽Oghayogagocchakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: yogam dhammam paṭicca yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe dve pi gocchakā āsava gocchaka sadisā ninnānākaraṇā 🔽ogha yoga gocchakam
